Texts.Chs: 一本极其劣质的历史书
关于由两个早已被遗忘的种族发动的一场古老战争的极其冗长的记述。看来整个战争完全是因为四块松饼和一磅烘焙面粉的分配不当而发生的。这场战争需要11456页才能叙述完。
Texts.Eng: An extremely long and drawn out accounting of an ancient war fought by two long-forgotten races. It appears that this entire war was based solely on the misapporpriation of four muffins and a pound of baking flour. This somehow takes 11,456 pages to accomplish.
